name: Connect Control Conquer
description:
Build a mech then use it to destroy endless waves of enemy mechs.  You can rebuild and change parts mid-combat but the game restarts if your cockpit is destroyed.  Please excuse any bugs (but let me know about them),  This is a work in progress for a game jam.

Controls:  

In the construction screen you can click the part buttons to grab a new part then move it over to a mounting point.  Click near a mounting point to attach it, or in space to drop it temporarily.  

While a part is selected you can change the part settings including rotation, drawing order and behavior.  Don't forget to assign a key to active parts like guns, rotors, or engines.  You can also set these to "Always On".  

The cockpit can be selected to change the mech's color.

Right click will drop and de-select a held part.
